messages.content: Vpd aetle shu
messages.standalone_question: What does "Vpd aetle shu" mean?
messages.standalone_en: What does "Vpd aetle shu" mean?

messages.content:
VPD (Vapor Pressure Deficit) ek maap chhe je hawa ma paani ni kami ne darshave chhe. Aapne jyaare hawa ma paani ni matra ochhi hoy, tyare VPD vadhe chhe. VPD ni maap ne samajva thi aapne samajhi sakiye chhiye ke aapna kheti ma paani ni jaruriyat chhe ke nahi, ane aapne pest control ne irrigation ma madad kare chhe.

Aapne VPD ni maap ne samajva maate, aapne hawa ni taapman, hawa ni humidity, ane soil moisture ni jankari ni jarur pade chhe. Aapne koi specific plot ma VPD ni jankari joiye chhe?
Tena thi shu nukshan thay
messages.standalone_question: What are the potential drawbacks of high Vapor Pressure Deficit (VPD)?
messages.standalone_en: What are the potential drawbacks of high Vapor Pressure Deficit (VPD)?

faq:
Q: What is Delta T & VPD?
A: Delta T is the difference between dry bulb and wet bulb temperature values. When this value is between 2-9, the stomatal cells on plant leaves are open, increasing the effectiveness of foliar applications.
   VPD (Vapor Pressure Deficit) represents the right time for fertigation when active absorption by a plant is highest.

messages.content:
VPD (Vapor Pressure Deficit) ni ochhadi maate kai kai nukshan thayi sake chhe:

1. **Paani ni kami**: Jyaare VPD vadhe chhe, tyare paani ni kami thayi sake chhe, je kheti ma paani ni kami ne darshave chhe. Aapne paani ni jaruriyat ne samajva maate VPD ni maap mahatvapurn chhe.

2. **Photosynthesis ma kami**: VPD vadhaare jyaare hoy, tyare paudho ni stomata khuli rahva maate mushkil thayi sake chhe, je photosynthesis ne prabhavit kare chhe.

3. **Pest and Disease**: VPD ni ochhadi maate paudho ma stress aave chhe, je pest and diseases ni sambhavna ne vadhaare chhe.

4. **Fertigation ni asar**: VPD ni ochhadi maate, paudho ni active absorption ni kshamata ochhi thayi sake chhe, je fertigation ni asar ne prabhavit kare chhe.

Aapne VPD ni maap ne samajva maate, aapne hawa ni taapman, humidity, ane soil moisture ni jankari ni jarur pade chhe. Aapne koi specific plot ma VPD ni jankari joiye chhe?
Have khetar shu rog aavse
messages.standalone_question: What diseases can affect crops?
messages.standalone_en: What diseases can affect crops?

faq:
Q: What diseases prediction does fyllo support?
A: Fyllo supports the following diseases:
    Alternaria, Alternaria Fruit Blotch, Alternaria blotch, Alternaria leaf blight,
    Anthracnose, Bacterial Blight, Bacterial Canker, Bacterial Spot, Blister blight, Botrytis mold, Brown Rust,
    Brown spot, Cercospora, Cercospora Leaf Spot, Cercospora leaf spot, Cigar end rot, Citrus scab, Colletotrichum, Damping off,
    Diplodia, Downy mildew, Early Blight, Fruit Canker, Fruit canker, Fusarium Wilt, Fusarium wilt, Graphiola leaf spot,
    Grey mold, Late Blight, Leaf Blight, Leaf Spot, Leaf spot, Marssonina blotch, Powdery Mildew, Powdery mildew,
    Purple blotch, Red rot, Rice blast, Root knot nematode, Rust, Scab, Sheath blight, Sigatoka leaf spot, Stylar End Rot,
    Whip smut, Xanthomonas, and Yellow Rust.

Q: What are the important diseases occur during seedling stage and control measures?
A: Collar rot, Damping off, Seedling blight diseases infect during seedling stage.
Drench/spray seedling with: Carbendazim @ 2.5g/ltr

messages.content:
Aapna plot "kairo 1" ma 21 December 2024 na din, be rog ni sambhavnaye chhe:

1. **Late Blight**: 59.8% sambhavnaye, risk level: **MEDIUM**
2. **Early Blight**: 57.8% sambhavnaye, risk level: **MEDIUM**

Aapne aa rog ni roktham maate samay par spray karvu jaruri chhe. Aapne koi specific spray schedule ni jarur chhe?
Late blight aetle kyo rog
messages.standalone_question: What is late blight?
messages.standalone_en: What is late blight?

messages.content:
Late Blight ek fungal rog chhe je khas karine potato ane tomato ma prabhavit kare chhe. Aa rog "Phytophthora infestans" fungus dwara thayi chhe. Late Blight ni pehchan ne samajva maate niche aapne kai kai mahatvapurn jankari aapvi chhe:

### Pahchan:
- **Pattao par daag**: Pattao par gol, bhurabhura daag aave chhe, je vadhu vadhu vadhva lage chhe.
- **Stems par blackening**: Stems par blackening thayi sake chhe.
- **Fruits par rogo**: Fruits par bhi daag aave chhe, je kharab thayi jaye chhe.

### Karan:
- **Humidity**: Vadhare humidity ane thandi hawa ma aa rog vadhe chhe.
- **Paani**: Paani ni adhikta thi fungus ne vikas ma madad male chhe.

### Roktham:
- **Fungicides**: Carbendazim, Mancozeb, ya Copper-based fungicides ni spray karvi.
- **Sanitation**: Kheti ma saaf safai rakhvi, rog prabhavit paudho ne turant hataavi devu.
- **Crop Rotation**: Crop rotation karva thi fungus ni sambhavnaye ochhi thayi sake chhe.

Aapne koi specific spray schedule ya madad joiye chhe?
Aana mate kyi dava no chantkav karvano rahse
messages.standalone_question: What treatment should be used for Late Blight?
messages.standalone_en: What treatment should be used for Late Blight?

messages.content:
Late Blight ne rokva maate aapne niche aapela fungicides no upyog kari sako cho:

### Fungicides:
1. **Mancozeb**: 2.5 g/liter paani ma milavi ne spray karvu.
2. **Copper-based fungicides**: Jevi ke Copper Oxychloride, 2.5 g/liter paani ma milavi ne spray karvu.
3. **Carbendazim**: 1 g/liter paani ma milavi ne spray karvu.

### Insecticides (Seed Treatment):
- **Imidacloprid 600 FS**: 5 to 8 ml/kg seeds.
- **Thiram**: 2 to 3 gm/kg seed.

Aapne aa dawao ne samay par spray karva maate dhyan rakhvu jaruri chhe, khas karine jyaare humidity vadhe chhe. Aapne koi specific spray schedule ya madad joiye chhe?
Aa dava no chantkav aatyare karva no rahse ke rog avya pachi
messages.standalone_question: Should the application of this medication be done now or after the disease has appeared?
messages.standalone_en: Should the application of this medication be done now or after the disease has appeared?

messages.content:
Aapna plot "kairo 1" maate aaj thi 28 December 2024 sudhi koi spray schedule nathi. Tethi, aapne aaj na samay ma spray karva ni jarur nathi. 

Jyaare aapne agal koi notification male, tyare spray karva ni jarur padi sake chhe. Aapne koi biji madad joiye chhe?
Na
messages.standalone_question: Is there no need for any further assistance?
messages.standalone_en: Is there no need for any further assistance?

messages.content: Saru! Koi biji madad joiye to khabar aapjo. Aapna kheti ma shubhkamna!
Thank you
messages.standalone_question: What is the appropriate timing for applying the fungicide?
messages.standalone_en: What is the appropriate timing for applying the fungicide?

faq:
Q: Can fungicide and insecticide be sprayed together?
A: For fungicides and insecticides to be sprayed together, it is important to consider factors like compatibility. For expert guidance tailored to your situation, we recommend reaching out to Fyllo’s CRM number for personalized advice.

Q: which are the insecticide and fungicide to be used for seed treatment
A: Insecticide:  Imidacloprid 600 FS – 5 to 8 ml/kg seeds
Fungicide: Thiram – 2 to 3 gm/kg seed

Q: Do I need to spray?
A: Check the disease pest spray schedule for the farmer and reply accordingly. Don't check metrics, only pre-defined schedules to be checked.

messages.content: Aapne swagat chhe! Koi biji madad joiye to khabar aapjo. Shubh din!

Gende k phool ki kheti kaise kre?
messages.standalone_question: How can one cultivate gender-specific flowers?
messages.standalone_en: How can one cultivate gender-specific flowers?

messages.content:
Gende ke phool ki kheti karne ke liye kuch mahatvapurn kadam hain:

1. **Bhoomi ka Chayan**: Gende ke phool ke liye achhi drainage wali, loamy ya sandy soil behtar hoti hai. Soil ka pH 6.0 se 7.0 ke beech hona chahiye.

2. **Beej ka Chayan**: Achhe quality ke gende ke beej kharidein. Beej ko insecticide aur fungicide se treat karna na bhoolen.

3. **Sowing ka Samay**: Gende ke phool ki kheti ke liye beej ko ritu ke anusar beejna chahiye. Aam taur par, gende ke beej ko monsoon ke baad ya phir ritu ke shuruaat mein beejna chahiye.

4. **Beej Bichana**: Beej ko 1-2 inch gehra bichana chahiye. Beej ke beech mein 12-18 inch ka faasla rakhein.

5. **Pani dena**: Beej bichaane ke baad, soil ko moist rakhna zaroori hai. Pani dene ka samay dhyan se chunen, jisse paani zyada na ho.

6. **Khadyan aur Poshan**: Gende ke phool ke liye nitrogen, phosphorus aur potassium ki zaroorat hoti hai. Fertilizers ka istemal karein.

7. **Rog aur Keet Niyantran**: Gende ke phool par keet aur rog ka khayal rakhein. Neem oil ya insecticides ka istemal karein.

8. **Katai**: Jab phool khilte hain, tab unhe samay par kaatna chahiye, jisse naye phool aayen.

In kadmon ko dhyan mein rakhkar aap gende ke phool ki kheti kar sakte hain.
Konse month m plant lgaye
messages.standalone_question: In which month should the plants be planted?
messages.standalone_en: In which month should the plants be planted?

messages.content:
Gende ke phool ke beej lagane ka sahi samay aam taur par monsoon ke baad hota hai, jo ki July se September ke beech hota hai. Is samay baarish ke karan soil moisture achhi hoti hai, jo beej ke liye anukool hota hai. 

Agar aap gende ke phool ki kheti kar rahe hain, to aapko July se September ke beech beej lagana chahiye.
Garmi m nhi kr skte?
messages.standalone_question: Can gende ke phool ki kheti be done in the summer?
messages.standalone_en: Can gende ke phool ki kheti be done in the summer?

messages.content:
Gende ke phool ki kheti garmi ke mahine (March se June) mein bhi ki ja sakti hai, lekin is samay par kuch baatein dhyan mein rakhni chahiye:

1. **Pani ki Vyavastha**: Garmi ke mahine mein soil jaldi sukhti hai, isliye aapko paani dene ki vyavastha achhi karni hogi. Regular irrigation zaroori hai.

2. **Chhaya**: Agar sambhav ho, to beej lagane ke sthal par kuch chhaya ka vyavastha karein, jisse beej ko direct dhoop se bachaya ja sake.

3. **Soil Moisture**: Soil moisture ko maintain rakhna bahut zaroori hai, isliye mulching ka istemal karein.

4. **Fertilizers**: Garmi ke samay mein fertilizers ka istemal samay par karein, jisse plants ko zaroori poshak tatva mil sake.

Agar aap in baaton ka dhyan rakhte hain, to garmi ke mahine mein bhi gende ke phool ki kheti ki ja sakti hai.
Kon c variety garmi ki h?
messages.standalone_question: Which variety of marigold is suitable for cultivation in hot weather?
messages.standalone_en: Which variety of marigold is suitable for cultivation in hot weather?

messages.content:
Garmi ke mahine mein gende ke phool ki kheti ke liye kuch pramukh varietyyan hain:

1. **African Marigold (Tagetes erecta)**: Ye variety garmi ke liye bahut achhi hoti hai. Iske phool bade aur sundar hote hain.

2. **French Marigold (Tagetes patula)**: Ye variety bhi garmi mein achha karti hai aur iski khushboo ke liye bhi jaana jaata hai.

3. **Crackerjack Marigold**: Ye variety garmi ke liye anukool hai aur iska phool bada aur rangin hota hai.

In varieties ko garmi ke mahine mein beejne par achha utpadan mil sakta hai. Aap inhe apne kshetra ke anusar chuniye.
February m lga skte h
messages.standalone_question: Can marigold seeds be planted in February?
messages.standalone_en: Can marigold seeds be planted in February?

messages.content:
Haan, aap gende ke phool ke beej February mahine mein bhi laga sakte hain, lekin is samay par kuch baatein dhyan mein rakhni chahiye:

1. **Temperature**: February mein thoda thanda mausam hota hai, jo beej ke liye anukool hai. Lekin, jaise jaise mahina aage badhega, garmi badhne lagegi.

2. **Irrigation**: Pani ki vyavastha achhi rakhni hogi, kyunki garmi ke mahine mein soil jaldi sukhti hai.

3. **Soil Preparation**: Soil ko achhe se tayar karein aur organic matter mila kar uski fertility badhayein.

4. **Variety ka Chayan**: Garmi ke liye anukool varieties ka chayan karein, jaise African Marigold ya French Marigold.

Agar aap in baaton ka dhyan rakhte hain, to February mein gende ke phool ke beej lagana sahi rahega.
Kinnow k liye whitewash kaise bnaye
messages.standalone_question: How to make whitewash for kinnow?
messages.standalone_en: How to make whitewash for kinnow?

messages.content:
Kinnow ke liye whitewash banane ke liye aapko kuch samagri ki zaroorat hogi. Yahan par ek saral vidhi di gayi hai:

### Samagri:
1. **Chuna (Lime)**: 1 kg
2. **Pani**: 10-15 liters
3. **Gum (adhesive)**: 100-200 grams (jaise ki casein glue ya kisi aur prakaar ka gum)
4. **Neela vitriol (Copper Sulfate)**: 50 grams (optional, fungicide ke liye)
5. **Bhaari (optional)**: 1-2 kg (ye whitewash ko aur bhi mazboot banata hai)

### Vidhi:
1. **Chuna ko Pighlaana**: Chuna ko paani mein achhe se ghol kar ek slurry bana lein. Isse 24 ghante ke liye chhod dein, jisse ye achhe se pighal jaye.

2. **Gum ka Milana**: Jab chuna pighal jaye, tab isme gum ko daal kar achhe se milayein. Gum se whitewash chipakne mein madad milegi.

3. **Neela Vitriol (optional)**: Agar aap fungicide istemal karna chahte hain, to is samay neela vitriol bhi daal sakte hain.

4. **Bhaari (optional)**: Agar aap bhaari istemal kar rahe hain, to ise bhi is mixture mein milayein.

5. **Pani ka Samayojan**: Agar mixture bahut gaadha ho, to thoda aur paani daal kar usse patla karein.

6. **Apply Karna**: Is whitewash ko kinnow ke pedon par brush ya spray se lagayein. Ye pedon ko dhoop se bachata hai aur rog se bhi suraksha karta hai.

Is prakriya se aap kinnow ke liye effective whitewash bana sakte hain.
Ran
messages.standalone_question: What is the meaning of "Ran"?
messages.standalone_en: What is the meaning of "Ran"?

messages.content: It seems like you mentioned "Ran." Could you please provide more context or specify what assistance you need related to agriculture?
બટાકા ની સાઈઝ વધારવા માટે કયું ખાતર આપવું
messages.standalone_question: What fertilizer should be used to increase the size of potatoes?
messages.standalone_en: What fertilizer should be used to increase the size of potatoes?
messages.content_transliterated: bataka knee saijh vadharava mate kayu khatar apvu

messages.content:
બટાકાની સાઈઝ વધારવા માટે, નીચેના ખાતરોનો ઉપયોગ કરી શકો છો:

### **Plot: Kairomatiyal (Potato - Santana)**
- **વર્તમાન તબક્કો:** વેજિટેટિવ ગ્રોથ (Vegetative Growth)
- **હાલની સપ્તાહ:** 3

1. **ફર્ટિગેશન (Fertigation)**
   - **Day 1:** 
     - Urea: 8.5 kg/acre
   - **Day 4:** 
     - 12-61-0: 6 kg/acre
     - Urea: 5 kg/acre
     - Magnesium Sulphate: 5 kg/acre

2. **ફોલિયર (Foliar)**
   - **Week 3:** 
     - 19-19-19: 1.5 kg/acre

### **Plot: Nero Retal (Potato - Hyfun)**
- **વર્તમાન તબક્કો:** વેજિટેટિવ ગ્રોથ (Vegetative Growth)
- **હાલની સપ્તાહ:** 4

1. **ફર્ટિગેશન (Fertigation)**
   - **Day 1:** 
     - Calcium Nitrate: 3.5 kg/acre
     - Urea: 6.5 kg/acre
   - **Day 4:** 
     - Potassium Nitrate: 7 kg/acre
     - Urea: 5 kg/acre

2. **ફોલિયર (Foliar)**
   - **Week 4:** 
     - Zinc Sulphate: 800 gm/acre
     - Ferrous Sulphate: 600 gm/acre
     - Manganese Sulphate: 400 gm/acre

આ ખાતરોનો યોગ્ય ઉપયોગ કરીને, તમે બટાકાની સાઈઝમાં સુધારો કરી શકો છો.

messages.content:
### Manikchaman Plot No.1 (Grapes)
- **Current Stage:** Berry Development (Week 3)
- **Fertigation Schedule for This Week:**
  - **Fertilizers:**
    - **13-40-13:** 3 kg/acre
    - **Calcium Nitrate:** 6.5 kg/acre
    - **Sulfate of Potash:** 6.5 kg/acre
    - **Magnesium Sulphate:** 2.5 kg/acre
  - **Notes:**
    - Phosphoric acid should be applied separately, 15-20 minutes before application of other fertilizers.
    - Calcium nitrate should be applied separately, 15-20 minutes after application of other fertilizers.

- **Next Week's Schedule (Week 4):**
  - Same fertilizers and notes as above.

### Super Plot New (Grapes)
- **Current Stage:** Shoot Development (Week 3)
- **Fertigation Schedule for This Week:**
  - **Foliar Application:**
    - **Solubor:** 300 gm/acre
    - **Gibberellic Acid (GA3):** 15 ppm
  - **Notes:**
    - The concentration of micro-nutrient fertilizers for foliar spray should not exceed 1% (e.g., 5 kg in 500 liters of water per acre).
    - Foliar application of PGR and micronutrients should be applied separately.

- **Next Week's Schedule (Beginning of Bloom, Week 1):**
  - **Fertilizers:**
    - **Mono Potassium Phosphate:** 3.5 kg/acre
    - **Phosphoric Acid 80%:** 1.5 kg/acre
  - **Notes:**
    - Phosphoric acid should be applied separately, 15-20 minutes before application of other fertilizers.

Make sure to follow the recommended schedules for optimal growth!
Marathi

messages.content:
### माणिकचामन प्लॉट नं. 1 (द्राक्षे)
- **सध्याचा टप्पा:** बेरी विकास (आठवडा 3)
- **या आठवड्याचा फर्टिगेशन कार्यक्रम:**
  - **खते:**
    - **13-40-13:** 3 किलोग्राम/एकर
    - **कॅल्शियम नायट्रेट:** 6.5 किलोग्राम/एकर
    - **सल्फेट ऑफ पोटॅश:** 6.5 किलोग्राम/एकर
    - **मॅग्नेशियम सल्फेट:** 2.5 किलोग्राम/एकर
  - **टीप:**
    - फॉस्फोरिक आम्ल वेगळे लागू करावे, इतर खते लागू करण्यापूर्वी 15-20 मिनिटे.
    - कॅल्शियम नायट्रेट इतर खते लागू केल्यानंतर 15-20 मिनिटे वेगळे लागू करावे.

- **पुढच्या आठवड्याचा कार्यक्रम (आठवडा 4):**
  - वर दिलेलीच खते आणि टीप.

### सुपर प्लॉट न्यू (द्राक्षे)
- **सध्याचा टप्पा:** शूट विकास (आठवडा 3)
- **या आठवड्याचा फर्टिगेशन कार्यक्रम:**
  - **फोलिअर अनुप्रयोग:**
    - **सोल्यूबॉर:** 300 ग्रॅम/एकर
    - **गिब्बेरलिक आम्ल (GA3):** 15 ppm
  - **टीप:**
    - फोलिअर स्प्रेमध्ये सूक्ष्म पोषण खते 1% पेक्षा जास्त नसावे (उदा., 500 लिटर पाण्यात 5 किलोग्राम प्रति एकर).
    - PGR आणि सूक्ष्म पोषण खते वेगळे लागू करावे.

- **पुढच्या आठवड्याचा कार्यक्रम (फुलांचा प्रारंभ, आठवडा 1):**
  - **खते:**
    - **मोनो पोटॅशियम फॉस्फेट:** 3.5 किलोग्राम/एकर
    - **फॉस्फोरिक आम्ल 80%:** 1.5 किलोग्राम/एकर
  - **टीप:**
    - फॉस्फोरिक आम्ल वेगळे लागू करावे, इतर खते लागू करण्यापूर्वी 15-20 मिनिटे.

सर्वोत्कृष्ट वाढीसाठी शिफारसी केलेल्या कार्यक्रमांचे पालन करणे सुनिश्चित करा!

messages.content:
તમારા "મેઈન પ્લોટ" માં બટાકાના પાક માટે કેટલીક બિમારીઓની શક્યતાઓ છે:

1. **લેટ બ્લાઇટ (Late Blight)**:
   - 21 ડિસેમ્બર: 60.6% (મધ્યમ જોખમ)
   - 20 ડિસેમ્બર: 49.3% (કમજોર જોખમ)
   - 19 ડિસેમ્બર: 42.0% (કમજોર જોખમ)

2. **અર્લી બ્લાઇટ (Early Blight)**:
   - 21 ડિસેમ્બર: 58.1% (મધ્યમ જોખમ)
   - 20 ડિસેમ્બર: 54.2% (મધ્યમ જોખમ)
   - 19 ડિસેમ્બર: 52.2% (મધ્યમ જોખમ)

આ બિમારીઓનું જોખમ મધ્યમ સ્તરે છે, તેથી તમારે તાત્કાલિક પગલાં લેવા જોઈએ. કૃપા કરીને પાકની સ્થિતિની સમીક્ષા કરો અને જો જરૂરી હોય તો યોગ્ય રાસાયણિક અથવા બાયોલોજિકલ ઉપચાર કરો.
Zinc kya kam karta hai
messages.standalone_question: What is the function of zinc?
messages.standalone_en: What is the function of zinc?

messages.content:
Zinc ek mahatvapurn khanij hai jo podon ke vikas aur unki swasthya ke liye zaroori hai. Yeh kuch pramukh karyon mein madad karta hai:

1. **Enzyme Function**: Zinc kai enzymes ka hissa hota hai jo podon ke metabolism mein sahayak hote hain.
2. **Photosynthesis**: Yeh prakash sanrachna mein madad karta hai, jo podon ko urja pradan karta hai.
3. **Growth Regulation**: Zinc podon ki vriddhi aur vikas ko niyantrit karta hai, jaise ki patton aur phoolon ka vikas.
4. **Disease Resistance**: Yeh podon ki rog pratiraksha ko badhata hai, jisse ve behtar swasthya aur utpadan prapt karte hain.

Zinc ki kami se podon mein vikas ki samasya, patton ka peela hona, aur rog prabhavit hone ki sambhavnayein badh jaati hain.

40 દિવસના બટાકા માટે, તમે નીચેના ખાતરોનો ઉપયોગ કરી શકો છો:

### Main Palot Bor valo (3rd Week of Vegetative Growth)
1. **Fertigation (Day 1)**:
   - 12-61-0: 6 kg/acre
   - Urea: 5 kg/acre
   - OR
   - 24-24-0: 16 kg/acre
   - OR
   - Urea: 6.5 kg/acre
   - Phosphoric acid 80%: 4.5 kg/acre

2. **Fertigation (Day 4)**:
   - 12-61-0: 6 kg/acre
   - Urea: 5 kg/acre
   - Magnesium Sulphate: 5 kg/acre
   - OR
   - 24-24-0: 16 kg/acre
   - Magnesium Sulphate: 5 kg/acre

### Vada valo Palot (2nd Week of Vegetative Growth)
1. **Fertigation (Day 1)**:
   - Urea: 6.5 kg/acre

2. **Fertigation (Day 4)**:
   - 12-61-0: 6 kg/acre
   - Urea: 5 kg/acre
   - Magnesium Sulphate: 5 kg/acre
   - OR
   - 24-24-0: 16 kg/acre
   - Magnesium Sulphate: 5 kg/acre

### Foliar Spray (For both plots)
- Use micro-nutrient fertilizers at a concentration of not more than 1% (e.g., 5 kg in 500 liters of water per acre).

આ ખાતરોનો ઉપયોગ કરીને, તમે તમારા બટાકાના પાકને સારી રીતે ઉછેરવા માટે મદદ કરી શકો છો.

messages.content:
બટાકા માં બોરોનનો ઉપયોગ ઘણા ફાયદા આપે છે:

1. **ફળના વિકાસમાં સહાય**: બોરોન ફળના વિકાસ અને ગુણવત્તામાં સુધારો કરે છે, જે બટાકાના ટ્યુબરના કદ અને સ્વાસ્થ્યને વધારવા માટે મહત્વપૂર્ણ છે.

2. **પોષણનું સંચાલન**: બોરોન પોષણના સંચાલનમાં મદદ કરે છે, ખાસ કરીને કૅલ્શિયમ અને અન્ય માઇક્રોન્યુટ્રિયન્ટ્સ સાથે.

3. **જડના વિકાસમાં સુધારો**: બોરોન જડના વિકાસને પ્રોત્સાહન આપે છે, જે જમીનમાંથી પોષણ અને પાણીની શોષણ ક્ષમતા વધારવા માટે મહત્વપૂર્ણ છે.

4. **રોગપ્રતિકારકતા**: બોરોન છોડની રોગપ્રતિકારકતામાં સુધારો કરે છે, જે બટાકાના પાકને વિવિધ રોગો અને જીવાતોથી સુરક્ષિત રાખે છે.

5. **ફળની ગુણવત્તા**: બોરોન ફળની ગુણવત્તા અને સ્વાદમાં સુધારો કરે છે, જે બજારમાં વેચાણ માટે મહત્વપૂર્ણ છે.

બોરોનનો યોગ્ય પ્રમાણમાં ઉપયોગ કરવો મહત્વપૂર્ણ છે, કારણ કે વધુ માત્રામાં તે ઝેરી બની શકે છે.
Baingan main baingan Mein pilaspan a Raha Hai ismein Kaun Sa fungi site ka upyog Karen aur kaun si dawai ka upyog Karen
messages.standalone_question: What type of fungi should be used and which medicine should be used for the yellowing in eggplant?
messages.standalone_en: What type of fungi should be used and which medicine should be used for the yellowing in eggplant?

messages.content:
Baingan (brinjal) mein pilaspan (powdery mildew) ke liye aapko fungicide ka upyog karna chahiye. Iske liye aap **Carbendazim** ya **Tebuconazole** ka istemal kar sakte hain. 

**Dawai ka upyog:**
- **Carbendazim**: 1-2 g/liter paani mein milakar spray karein.
- **Tebuconazole**: 0.5-1 ml/liter paani mein milakar spray karein.

Yeh dawaiyan aapke baingan ke rogon ko control karne mein madad karengi.
આજે બટાકા માં કયું ખાતર આપો

messages.content:
આજે, તમારા બટાકાના પાક માટે નીચેના ખાતરો આપવાની ભલામણ છે:

### Dela Valu (4 acres)
- **Foliar Method (Vegetative Growth, Week 4)**:
  - Zinc Sulphate: 800 gm/acre
  - Ferrous Sulphate: 600 gm/acre
  - Manganese Sulphate: 400 gm/acre

- **Fertigation Method (Vegetative Growth, Week 4)**:
  - Calcium Nitrate: 3.5 kg/acre
  - Urea: 6.5 kg/acre (Apply Calcium Nitrate separately, 15-20 minutes after other fertilizers)

### Khejada Valu (5 acres)
- **Foliar Method (Vegetative Growth, Week 4)**:
  - Zinc Sulphate: 800 gm/acre
  - Ferrous Sulphate: 600 gm/acre
  - Manganese Sulphate: 400 gm/acre

- **Fertigation Method (Vegetative Growth, Week 4)**:
  - Calcium Nitrate: 3.5 kg/acre
  - Urea: 6.5 kg/acre (Apply Calcium Nitrate separately, 15-20 minutes after other fertilizers)

### Patsala (3 acres)
- **Fertigation Method (Vegetative Growth, Week 5)**:
  - Calcium Nitrate: 3.5 kg/acre
  - Magnesium Sulphate: 5 kg/acre
  - Urea: 6.5 kg/acre (Apply Calcium Nitrate separately, 15-20 minutes after other fertilizers)

આ ખાતરો આપવાથી તમારા પાકની વૃદ્ધિ અને આરોગ્યમાં સુધારો થશે.

messages.content:
ફુવારા માટે એકરનું માપ આપવું હોય તો, 1 એકરમાં 43,560 ચોરસ ફૂટ હોય છે. 

જો તમે 19 ઇંચના ફુવારા માટે માપ કાઢવા માંગતા હો, તો તમારે નીચેના પગલાં અનુસરવા પડશે:

1. 19 ઇંચને ફૂટમાં રૂપાંતરિત કરો: 19 ઇંચ = 19/12 = 1.58 ફૂટ.
2. હવે, 1 એકરમાં ફુવારા માટેની કુલ લંબાઈ શોધો: 
   - 43,560 ચોરસ ફૂટ / 1.58 ફૂટ = 27,550.63 ફૂટ.

આ રીતે, 19 ઇંચના ફુવારા માટે 1 એકરમાં લગભગ 27,550.63 ફૂટનું માપ આવશે.
ખાત૨
messages.standalone_question: What is the measurement for a fountain in an acre?
messages.standalone_en: What is the measurement for a fountain in an acre?

messages.content: મને ખેદ છે, પરંતુ "ખાત૨" વિશે વધુ સ્પષ્ટતા આપશો? શું તમે ખાતર અથવા અન્ય કોઈ વિશિષ્ટ માહિતી વિશે પૂછવા માંગો છો? કૃપા કરીને વધુ વિગતો આપો, જેથી હું તમને યોગ્ય રીતે મદદ કરી શકું.
ખાતર
messages.standalone_question: What is fertilizer?
messages.standalone_en: What is fertilizer?

faq:
Q: What are mixed fertilizers (NPK)?
A: NPK fertilizers are represented by a three-number sequence, such as 10-10-10, indicating the percentage by weight of each nutrient. For example, 10-10-10 means the fertilizer contains 10% Nitrogen, 10% Phosphorus, and 10% Potassium elements in the chemical mixture. Some examples are below:
0-40-37, 0-40-40, 0-49-32, 0-52-34 (Mono potassium phosphate), 0-55-18, 0-60-20, 0-9-46, 10-26-26, 10-54-10, 11-44-11, 12-11-18, 12-32-16, 12-61-0, 13-0-45 (Potassium Nitrate), 13-40-13, 19-19-19, 20-20-0-13 (Ammonium Phosphate Sulphate), 24-24-0, 30-10-10, 6-34-17
Or 0:40:37, 0:40:40, 0:49:32, 0:52:34 (Mono potassium phosphate), 0:55:18, 0:60:20, 0:9:46, 10:26:26, 10:54:10, 11:44:11, 12:11:18, 12:32:16, 12:61:0, 13:0:45 (Potassium Nitrate), 13:40:13, 19:19:19, 20:20:0:13 (Ammonium Phosphate Sulphate), 24:24:0, 30:10:10, 6:34:17
Or 0.40.37, 0.40.40, 0.49.32, 0.52.34 (Mono potassium phosphate), 0.55.18, 0.60.20, 0.9.46, 10.26.26, 10.54.10, 11.44.11, 12.11.18, 12.32.16, 12.61.0, 13.0.45 (Potassium Nitrate), 13.40.13, 19.19.19, 20.20.0.13 (Ammonium Phosphate Sulphate), 24.24.0, 30.10.10, 6.34.17

messages.content:
ખાતર (ફર્ટિલાઇઝર) એ પાકના વિકાસ માટે જરૂરી પોષક તત્વો પૂરા પાડવા માટે ઉપયોગમાં લેવાતું એક મહત્વપૂર્ણ સાધન છે. ખાતરમાં મુખ્યત્વે ત્રણ પ્રકારના પોષક તત્વો હોય છે:

1. **નાઇટ્રોજન (N)** - પાંદડાં અને શાખાઓના વિકાસ માટે જરૂરી.
2. **ફોસ્ફોરસ (P)** - મૂળ અને ફૂલોના વિકાસ માટે મહત્વપૂર્ણ.
3. **પોટેશિયમ (K)** - પાકની સામાન્ય આરોગ્ય અને પ્રતિકારક શક્તિ માટે જરૂરી.

NPK ખાતરો સામાન્ય રીતે ત્રણ અંકમાં દર્શાવવામાં આવે છે, જેમ કે 19-19-19, જે દર્શાવે છે કે ખાતરમાં 19% નાઇટ્રોજન, 19% ફોસ્ફોરસ અને 19% પોટેશિયમ છે.

જો તમને ખાતરના વિશિષ્ટ પ્રકારો અથવા ઉપયોગ વિશે વધુ માહિતી જોઈએ, તો કૃપા કરીને જણાવો!
